description: Returns details about a specified privacy budget template.

parameters.name: collaborationIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for one of your collaborations.

parameters.name: privacyBudgetTemplateIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for one of your privacy budget templates.

nested_items.name: collaborationPrivacyBudgetTemplate
nested_items.description: Returns the details of the privacy budget template that you requested.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the collaboration privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the collaboration privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the collaboration that includes this collaboration privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the collaboration that includes this collaboration privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: creatorAccountId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the account that created this collaboration privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the collaboration privacy budget template was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the collaboration privacy budget template was updated.

nested_items.name: privacyBudgetType
nested_items.description: The type of privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: autoRefresh
nested_items.description: How often the privacy budget refreshes.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: Specifies the epsilon and noise parameters for the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: epsilon
nested_items.description: The epsilon value that you specified.

nested_items.name: usersNoisePerQuery
nested_items.description: Noise added per query is measured in terms of the number of users whose contributions you want to obscure. This value governs the rate at which the privacy budget is depleted.
